title: Minor optimizations.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `96.41%`
> Merging **#74** into **master** will increase coverage by **+0.17%** as of [`1d49290`][3]


```diff
@@            master     #74   diff @@
======================================
  Files           14      14       
  Stmts          719     726     +7
  Branches        87      87       
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            692     700     +8
  Partial          0       0       
+ Missed          27      26     -1
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`1d49290`][3]


-----
### [Uncovered Suggestions][2]

1. `+0.42%` via [...estFirstSearch.scala#213...215](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/BestFirstSearch.scala?ref=1d49290a53968dc8ec99fcf9f72ecfa14a626b87#213) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...lafmt/ScalaFmt.scala#53...54](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/ScalaFmt.scala?ref=1d49290a53968dc8ec99fcf9f72ecfa14a626b87#53) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...internal/Split.scala#79...80](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Split.scala?ref=1d49290a53968dc8ec99fcf9f72ecfa14a626b87#79) 
1. *[See 7 more...][2]*

body:
* custom hashcode for Token and FormatToken
* Expire policies, suprisingly little improvement.

```
[info] Benchmark                 Mode  Cnt     Score    Error  Units
[info] BaseLinker.scalafmt       avgt   10   415.639 ± 11.092  ms/op

[info] SourceMapWriter.scalafmt  avgt   10   158.080 ±  3.959  ms/op
```
